game.name: The Witch's Fairy Tale
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "The Witch's Fairy Tale" is an action rogue, role-playing game developed by "a little Han Han Duck OVO", you will play a witch, to find magic around the world, your adventure along the way will be written as a fairy tale to pass on.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "The Witch's Fairy Tale" is an action rogue, role-playing game developed by "a little Han Han Duck OVO", you will play a witch, to find magic around the world, your adventure along the way will be written as a fairy tale to pass on.
